description.value:
When worn provides Fear(2), or increases Character's Fear rating by 1 if they already have Fear(2) or higher. Also grants Battle Range Talent and Unnatural Weapon Skill(4). Can't be worn over a helmet.

Requirements

Must have Mark of Khorne to wear, Heretical.

Effect: Near Unique

Notes: -
